英文法規名稱: Organization Act of Civil Service Development Institute, Directorate-General of Personnel Administration, Executive Yuan
中文法規名稱: 行政院人事行政總處公務人力發展學院組織法
沿革內容: 1.Promulgated on April 19, 2017 and enforced on July 7,2017

法規內容.條文內容: The Directorate-General of Personnel Administration, Executive Yuan established the Civil Service Development Institute (hereinafter referred to as the “Institute”) in order to deal with the affairs related to civil service training and development of agencies subordinated to the Executive Yuan and the local agencies.
The Institute shall appoint one President at the senior rank 13th, and one or two Vice Presidents at the senior rank 12th.
The ranks and quota by job title of the Institute shall be tabulated separately.
The date of enforcement of the Act shall be set via an order of the Executive Yuan.
